audioText: Tu n'oublieras aucunement cette décision idiote que tu as prise hier soir.
question: What won't you forget?
options: The stupid decision you made last night
The smart choice you avoided yesterday
The brilliant idea you had this morning
The careful plan you developed last week
explanation: The correct answer is 'The stupid decision you made last night'. The text states 'Tu n'oublieras aucunement cette décision idiote que tu as prise hier soir' - You will not forget at all this stupid decision that you made last night. 'Aucunement' means 'not at all/in no way', 'oublieras' is the future tense of 'oublier' (to forget), and 'idiote' (stupid) agrees with the feminine noun 'décision'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - personal regret context
